name: Pinkfong Baby Shark Storybook
description: Have an amazing reading experience with !  Join us in our underwater adventure with Baby Sharks family!  You can read fun stories featuring the Shark Family and play interactive games at the same time.  Touch and tap the characters, pop the bubbles on each page, and review each story with mini-games at the end of every book.  Let kids discover the fun in reading books!  [App Features]  1.Exiting underwater stories of BABY SHARK! - Discover fun adventures of the Shark Family -- from the Red Riding Hood to the Police Shark! - You can choose either Read for me or I will Read option.  2. Fun Mini Games & Puzzles - Enjoy mini games after reading each story!  - 10 interactive games are waiting for you.   3. Automatic Read-for-me option - Listen to all the Storybooks with the voices of Mom and Dad. Kids can also read by themselves.  4. Read in multiple languages! - All the Storybooks and Mini Games are available in different languages. (English, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian)  [List of Books Included] 1. The Shark Family Orchestra 2. Red Riding Hood 3. Police Shark 4. Colors in the Ocean 5. Hot Clam Buns 6. Baby Sharks Christmas 7. Baby Shark and the Tooth Fairy 8. Baby Shark and Little Pisces 9. Grandma Sharks Magic Wand 10. Smiles with Balloons  Have FUN reading and learning with Baby Shark!
